import React, {useEffect , useState} from 'react'; import './css/met.css'; function Main() { const[worldInfo , setWorldInfo] = useState({}); useEffect(() => { fetch('https://disease.sh/v3/covid-19/all') .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => { setWorldInfo(data); }); },[]) return (

CoronaVirus Test

1.7 million people died in the world due to the Corona Virus

CoronaVirus is a dangerous threat to the elderly, children and families

Please do the CoronaVirus test to protect our world!
